sellerCard.description:
Hello to you! Gabriel here, a full time freelance web developer and graphic designer enjoying to create websites and to design various marketing assets. 

I can create any type of website, edit WordPress sites, fix errors and customize themes regarding HTML, WordPress and Shopify websites. Contact me and let's bring your project to life!

description.content:
Hello!


Are you looking for a clean website tailored to your business, professionally done and delivered fast?


I will create and deliver a professional website in less than 7 days. 


A bit about me


I'm working as a graphic designer and web developer mainly focusing on creating websites & marketing assets to enhance businesses of any size.


Along the time I had the pleasure to work with both small business entrepreneurs and big companies like Microsoft. A professional online presence is a must for everyone.


I've designed and developed websites for different industries including IT&C, electronics, health, wellness and more.


What I need from you?


  • Brief description of your business or niche. (required) 
  • Wordpress logins or cPanel access. (optional) 
  • Your logo. I can design one for FREE. (optional)
  • Text and imagery content. (optional) 


What you get from me?


A clean, modern & fully functional website. Responsive and SEO friendly on every device.

Quick turnarounds

Top notch customer support. 


Please read the working process in FAQ section. It is always better to have a brief discussion before starting a project.


Place an order and let me build your online presence!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the working process?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
1. Discuss your business and goals.
2. I present multiple website concepts and recommendations.
3. We discuss the design and pages.
4. Decide the final design & apply branding elements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How come the website is delivered so fast and promising quality services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The website will be built based on pre-made divi templates and adjusted to your brand.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I don’t have wordpress or cPanel access?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: if not provided, I will not be able to upload it on your server and I will deliver the website in zip format. You can upload it on your website at a latter time.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I don't have the text content or imagery ready?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If not provided, placeholder text and images will be used. Don't worry, the website will be fully editable and you will be able to easily update the text at any time.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you create online shops?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. I can design and develop online shops based on Wordpress or Shopify. Contact me.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don't have hosting and domain. What to do?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can assist you in choosing the domain name and recommend a reliable hosting provider.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I have new template. Can you customize it?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. I can customize your template based on your requirements.

packageList.title: Presentation Website, 4 pages
packageList.description: Home + About +Services+ Contact pages. Contact me to discuss custom requests.

customExtras.buyerTooltip: add basic TOS and Privacy Policy pages
install and setup google analytics or gtm
customExtras.label: Analytics

customExtras.buyerTooltip: add floating social media share buttons
customExtras.label: Social Integration

openGraph.title: design and develop quality website

reviews.comment: Gabriel Soare was a pleasure to work with on my website development project! His code expertise and attention to details were IMPRESSIVE, and the documentation was spot-on. Plus, his quick responsiveness and politeness made the whole process smooth - highly recommend! 👍
Very accommodating of my request to create a site that is easy to update and answered all my questions.

seller_response.comment: Very clear communication and guidelines! Thank you!

reviews.comment: Je suis très satisfaite du service reçu. Gabriel a su répondre à mes attentes, tout en respectant les délais convenus. La communication a été fluide, ce qui a facilité notre collaboration. Le travail livré est conforme à ce que j'avais demandé. Je recommande vivement et n'hésiterai pas à revenir pour de futurs projets.

seller_response.comment: Communication et directives très claires! Merci beaucoup Pauline!
Once again, very clear communication and guidelines.

reviews.comment:
Nice guy, did a great job, but seems to not understand that having a client go and run a bunch of scripts to a webserver with a bunch of files on it is not safe.

Generally not security conscious, which makes live very hard in 2024.

Having to audit 750 lines of code, and files I need to upload is not my idea of a good time.

seller_response.comment:
Thank you for the feedback, received good guidelines!

We have discussed prior opening the order that I will either deliver the source files, or assist by migrating the files on your server. You refused to provide hosting access, and asked me to provide a way to load the files - there is no other alternative that I see beside sending the files, which is what I did.

notableClients.name: Microsoft
notableClients.interaction_description: Been part of the marketing team, I handled web design, email newsletters, ad banners, print materials, brand consistency, A/B testing, analytics, and other marketing materials.

enriched_details.name: Microsoft
enriched_details.description: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology corporation which produces computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services.
